argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsumcl.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsumcl.g | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 4 |  | gsumcl.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 5 |  | gsumcl.f | |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) |
| 6 |  | gsumcl2.w | |- ( ph -> ( F supp .0. ) e. Fin ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Cntz ` G ) = ( Cntz ` G ) |
| 8 |  | #P_cmnmnd | |- ( G e. CMnd -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 10 | 1, 7, 3, 5 | #P_cntzcmnf | |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( ( Cntz ` G ) ` ran F ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 7, 9, 4, 5, 10, 6 | #P_gsumzcl2 | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) e. B ) |
